title: RAND Experts Offer Analysis of Israeli-Hamas Conflict
descriptions: On October 12, RAND experts will discuss the unfolding Israel-Hamas war and the aftermath of last weekend's unprecedented attacks from Gaza. Topics will include potential military responses from the Israeli Defense Forces and the United States, Israeli-Palestinian political dynamics, non-state terror groups and hostage situations, and geopolitical implications.

image.desc: Palestine and Israel flags painted on a broken wall, with a fissure between them, photo by ffikretow/Getty Images

sub_content.What: Media call on Thursday, October 12. RAND experts will discuss the unfolding Israel-Hamas war and the aftermath of last weekend's unprecedented attacks from Gaza. Topics will include potential military responses from the Israeli Defense Forces and the United States, Israeli-Palestinian political dynamics, non-state terror groups and hostage situations, and geopolitical implications.

sub_content.When:
Thursday, October 12
11:00 a.m. ET/8:00 a.m. PT

sub_content.Where: To join this virtual conversation, please contact media@rand.org for a link. Please note this discussion is limited to journalists.

sub_content.Interviews:
To arrange an interview, contact the RAND Office of Media Relations:
(703) 414-4795 or
(310) 451-6913, or
send an email to media@rand.org.
